Headline: #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clarendon/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Marine Drive, Wilson and Clarendon: due to street blockage near Clarendon/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Marine Drive, Wilson, Clarendon and over regular route, due to street blockage near Clarendon/Lawrence.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute near Woodlawn/Hyde Park
ShortDescription: 172 buses temp. rerouted NB Woodlawn, 53rd, University, Hyde Park and Woodlawn; SB Hyde park, Greenwood, 53rd and Ellis: near Woodlawn/Hyde Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Woodlawn/Hyde Park, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/Hyde Park.

Northbound buses will operate via Woodlawn, 53rd, University, Hyde Park and Woodlawn including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Hyde Park, Greenwood, 53rd and Ellis.

Allow extra travel time.
